name: Evodevo II: Enhanced Edition
description:
It is the 24th century, and humanity's reach has extended to the battleground of a war that ended eons ago.

There is much to be done. Asteroids to clear, parts to be salvaged, and answers to be learned. These depths of space are still littered with weapons from the old war, and those who would use them for their own ends...

The enhanced edition of Evodevo II features more levels, improved graphics, unlockable achievements, and a number of quality-of-life improvements.

Controls

Thrust forward/rotate with the arrow keys.
Thrust left/right with Z/X.
Fire weapons with Space.

(Controls are rebindable in-game.)

Evodevo II: Enhanced Edition was made for the thirty-fourth Godot Wild Jam.
The source code can be found here.
